metadata.name: CrystalMello
metadata.description:
[Art by Steven Messing](https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0582205/)

  The Crystal Mello lives in a parallel reality where Marshmello is able to assemble and reassemble his body as he pleases. This version of Mello can regrow any lost body part using his crystals.

  Album: Joytime II

 â™« Tell Me

 Each holder of a CrystalMello token will be invited to join one (1), ninety (90) minute virtual album listening party with Marshmello. In addition, this token is verifiable for:

 - Two (2) Premium Vegas Residency tickets
